headline: Kugadzira kwakasiyana-siyana mazita ekuda kuziva uye kuona
description: Sketches? Ndinovaburitsa kuhupenyu sekuona kwemhando. Kuvavarira kuumbwa seyakawanda iciciic kuzivikanwa sezvinobvira.
now-description: Yakazvimirira, ichirovera chiratidzo chemhando yevatengi vatsva.
name: Tanvir Hasan Bijoy
